attributes.action: Knight Kevin Sinfield for his services in fundraising and raising awareness MND
attributes.additional_details: MMD is a terminal illness that needs major research in finding a cure. Since his friend Rob Burrow was diagnosed Kev has worked tirelessly to highlight this vile condition. Also raising £millions for vital research.
attributes.background: Kevin deserves being Knighted for all his hard work.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition. 

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
